alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 3:22PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Benito County through 345 PM PDT... At 321 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles northeast of Greenfield, or 28 miles northeast of Arroyo Seco, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central San Benito County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park
